Another day.

Another school shooting.

Another community that will never be the same.

Another family grieving the same pain that I did.

Another 100 dead from gun violence.

Another day. 260 of them. 

260 days since the House passed a bipartisan bill to save lives.

#ActNow

Another school shooting, with two dead, here in a country that specializes in gun deaths. So here's the piece I post after every shooting as a reminder that we have tools that can reduce gun deaths. What we lack as a country is the political will. https://t.co/avVvSu95nH

We're not going to ban guns, any more than we ban cars. But we can make guns safer and limit access to them, just as we do with cars. We've reduced auto fatality rates and we can similarly reduce gun fatality rates. But we need to act, not just indulge in thoughts and prayers.
